name: rolling-kick
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A fast kick delivered from
a rapid spin.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A fast kick delivered from
a rapid spin.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A quick kick from a
rolling spin.
It may make the
foe flinch.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user cuts a
quick spin and lashes
out with a sharp
kick.

The user cuts a
quick spin and lashes

kick.

spinning kick. It
may also make the
target flinch.

Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
